# Symbol of Stunning (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 7]], [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 14th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 14]], [[BoXM 14th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 14]]

**Casting Time:** 10 minutes

**Components:** V, S, M (mercury and phosphorus, plus powdered diamond and opal worth 5,000 gp each)

**Range:** 0 ft.; see text

**Effect:** One symbol

**Duration:** See text

**Saving Throw:** Will negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 356

This spell functions like *[[Symbol of Death (Spell)|symbol of death]]*, except that all creatures within 60 feet of a *symbol of stunning* instead become [[Stunned|stunned]] for 1d6 rounds.

*Note*: Magic traps such as *symbol of stunning* are hard to detect and disable. A rogue (only) can use the [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] skill to find a *symbol of stunning* and [[Disable Device (Skill)|Disable Device]] to thwart it. The DC in each case is 25 + spell level, or 32 for *symbol of stunning*.
